Class StatToolbox

java.lang.Object
bartMachine.StatToolbox
public class StatToolbox extends Object
This is a class where we're going to put all sorts of useful functions as a utility-style class

    • sample_from_inv_gamma

      public static double sample_from_inv_gamma(double k, double theta)
      Draws a sample from an inverse gamma distribution.
      Parameters:
      k - The shape parameter of the inverse gamma distribution of interest
      theta - The scale parameter of the inverse gamma distribution of interest
      Returns:
      The sampled value

    • sample_from_norm_dist

      public static double sample_from_norm_dist(double mu, double sigsq)
      Draws a sample from a normal distribution.
      Parameters:
      mu - The mean of the normal distribution of interest
      sigsq - The variance of the normal distribution of interest
      Returns:
      The sample value

    • multinomial_sample

      public static int multinomial_sample(it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.ints.IntArrayList vals, double[] probs)
      Sample from a multinomial distribution
      Parameters:
      vals - The integer values of the labels in this multinomial distribution
      probs - The probabilities with which to sample the labels (must be the same length of the vals)
      Returns:
      The integer label of the value that was drawn from this multinomial distribution

    • rand

      public static double rand()
      A convenience method for a random object
      Returns:
      A random number drawn from a uniform distirbution bounded between 0 and 1.

    • nextInt

      public static int nextInt(int bound)
      A convenience method for nextInt from the random object
      Parameters:
      bound - the upper bound (exclusive). Must be positive.
      Returns:
      a random integer between 0 (inclusive) and bound (exclusive)
